scriptedContentFragment.name: Forum-Thread-Widget -v7
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($forum = $core_v2_forum.Current) #set($thread = $core_v2_forumThread.Current) #set($wikiPage = $core_v2_wikiPage.Current) #set($currentUser = $core_v2_user.Current) #set($accessingUser = $core_v2_user.Accessing) #set($replies = []) #set($isQuestionAndAnswer = false) #set($showInlineReplies = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('showInlineReplies', false)) #set($hasModeratePermission = $core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums', $forum.Id, 'Forum_Moderate').IsAllowed) #set($threadReplyUrl = $core_v2_page.AbsoluteUrl($core_v2_forumUrls.Thread($thread.Id))) #set($hasModifyThreadPermission = $core_v2_nodePermission.Get("forums", $forum.Id, "Forum_ModifyPost", "%{ PostId = '${thread.Id}', PostType = 'threads'}").IsAllowed) #set($removeCaptureButtonId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId("deleteWikiPage")) #set($posts = false) #set($isOnFirstPage = true) #set($pageIndex = $core_v2_ui.GetCurrentPageIndex()) #set($currentReply = false) #set($currentReply = $core_v2_forumReply.Current) #if($thread.ThreadType == "QuestionAndAnswer") #set($isQuestionAndAnswer = true) #end #if(!$core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums', $forum.Id, 'Forum_ReadForum').IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end ##$core_v2_forumThread.IncrementViewCount($thread.Id) #if($isQuestionAndAnswer) #if($currentReply && $currentReply.Id != $thread.Id) #set($pageIndex = $core_v2_forumReply.GetForumReplyPageIndex($thread.Id, $currentReply.Id, "%{PageSize = '15', IncludeThreadStarter = 'False'}")) #end #set($posts = $core_v2_forumReply.List($thread.Id, "%{PageIndex = $pageIndex, PageSize = 15, IncludeThreadStarter = 'False'}")) #else #if($currentReply && $currentReply.Id != $thread.Id) #set($pageIndex = $core_v2_forumReply.GetForumReplyPageIndex($thread.Id, $currentReply.Id, "%{PageSize = '15', IncludeThreadStarter = 'True'}")) #end #set($posts = $core_v2_forumReply.List($thread.Id, "%{PageIndex = $pageIndex, PageSize = 15, IncludeThreadStarter = 'True'}")) #end #if ($posts) #foreach($postItem in $posts) #set($lastPostId = $postItem.Id) #end #end #set($totalCountPlusOne = $posts.TotalCount + 1) #set($lastPageIndex = $core_v2_ui.GetLastPageIndex($posts.PageSize, $totalCountPlusOne)) #if($lastPageIndex && $lastPageIndex != $posts.PageIndex) #set($threadReplyUrl = $core_v2_page.AdjustQueryString($threadReplyUrl, "$core_v2_ui.PageIndexQueryStringKey=${lastPageIndex}")) #end #if($posts.PageIndex > 1) #set($isOnFirstPage = false) #end #if($wikiPage) #set($wikiPageUrl = $core_v2_wikiUrls.Page($wikiPage.Id))
$core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource("Wiki_CapturedThread"), "$wikiPage.Title") $core_v2_language.GetResource("Wiki_Recapture") #if($hasModifyThreadPermission) | $core_v2_language.GetResource("Wiki_Capture_Delete") #end
#end #if($isQuestionAndAnswer) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile("view-questionandanswer.vm") #else $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile("view-flat.vm") #end #if($posts && $posts.TotalCount > 0) $core_v2_ui.Pager($posts.PageIndex, $posts.PageSize, $posts.TotalCount, "%{BaseUrl = '${threadReplyUrl}', ShowPrevious = 'True', ShowNext = 'True'}") #end #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.thread') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="showInlineReplies" resourceName="CF_Forum_ShowInlineReply" dataType="bool" defaultValue="false" /> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Displays the contents of a forum thread.
You must enter a reply before you attempt to submit.
Are you sure you want to delete this link?
There was an error trying to lock or unluck the thread.
There was an error changing the moderation level for the user
This is marked as an answer.
You have posted to a forum that requires a moderator to approve posts before they are publicly available.
